DOC.brief_title: Supplemental Oxygen - Effect Occurrence Subsequent Cancer After Abdominal Surgery ( Follow-up PROXI Trial )
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year old . Laparotomy , acute elective . In case gynaecological surgery malignancy suspect ( define risk ovarian malignancy index > 200 specimen atypical neoplastic cell ) . Other surgery within 30 day ( except surgery local anaesthesia ) . Chemotherapy within 3 month . Inability give inform consent .
